[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-localnet/src/health_checker.rs] [Function: check() - Postgres variant] [Connection Exhaustion] Does AsyncPgConnection::establish create persistent connections that are never closed, leading to connection pool exhaustion in PostgreSQL after repeated health checks? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-localnet/src/health_checker.rs] [Function: check() - Postgres variant] [Timeout Configuration] Is there a connection timeout for PostgreSQL connections, or can a hanging database server cause indefinite blocking in the health check? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-localnet/src/health_checker.rs] [Function: check() - Postgres variant] [SSL/TLS Enforcement] Does the connection string enforce SSL/TLS for PostgreSQL connections, or can an attacker downgrade to unencrypted connections and intercept database credentials? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-localnet/src/health_checker.rs] [Function: check() - Postgres variant] [Connection String Parsing] Can malformed connection strings cause panics or undefined behavior in diesel_async's connection parsing logic? (Medium)
